long_description: The Arc'teryx Atom LT pants are insulated and weather-resistant, making them ideal as an outer layer to preserve warmth during down time on your alpine adventures. Coreloft 60(TM) insulation delivers lightweight warmth during cold conditions. Breathable, stretch fabric has a Durable Water Repellent finish that helps bead up water on the surface; wind resistant. Articulated knees and seat aid comfort and movement. Full-length separating side zippers; bottom snap closure on zipper. Arc'teryx Atom LT pants are lightweight, compressible and packable. Elasticized waist; adjustable cuffs; internal stow pocket with attachment point.
